well, you could make your life easy and NAT the internal-internal network into the internal network, then, ensuring you have a default route than points to the interface that runs into your internal network, everything should work
this implies, of course, that no one on the internal network will be able to see anyone on the internal-internal network direclty

yeah, i would have done it with ip, but that works too
perhaps you would have more luck with: sudo ip route add default via 192.168.1.1 dev ethX
but you need to make sure that the 192.168.0.0/24 network is referenced in your route table...
